message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'm willing to give you a good chunk of the money to start.  Hope you'll accept!
That's a very generous offer Alice, but I think we can make this a bit more equitable. How about we split it closer to even?
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a bigger share than last round, but I also need to make sure I get a fair amount. What do you say?
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time. The value of the money is going down with each round.  A 50/50 split is fair and ensures we both benefit. Let's do it!
